about_the_game:
Welcome to the Astro Monsters Show!


The Official Soundtrack for Redneck Ed: Astro Monsters Show will dive you into the atmosphere of this crazy alien world full of funny, dangerous and mysterious creatures.

Composed by Constantine Chistiakov.
